Package renderer

Class Render

java.lang.Object
renderer.Render
public class Render
extends java.lang.Object
Renderer class is responsible for generating pixel color map from a graphic scene, using ImageWriter class

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    private class  Render.Pixel
    Pixel is an internal helper class whose objects are associated with a Render object that they are generated in scope of.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the render

      public Render setMultithreading​(int threads)
      Set multi-threading

      Returns:
      the Render object itself

    • castRay

      private void castRay​(int nX, int nY, int j, int i)
      Cast ray from camera in order to color a pixel
      Parameters:
      nX - resolution on X axis (number of pixels in row)
      nY - resolution on Y axis (number of pixels in column)
      j - pixel's column number (pixel index in row)
      i - pixel's row number (pixel index in column)

    • colors5Centers

      private java.util.List<Color> colors5Centers​(Point3D pc, double Rx, double Ry)
      calculate the colors of 5 centers on pixel
      Parameters:
      pc - -the center of the pixel(point 3D)
      Rx - -width of the pixel
      Ry - -height of the pixel
      Returns:
      list of colors

    • recursive

      private Color recursive​(java.util.List<Color> corners, double Rx, double Ry, int level, Point3D Pc)
      Parameters:
      corners - -list of the ray from the corners of the pixel
      Rx - -width of the pixel
      Ry - -height of the pixel
      level - -the death of the recursive
      Pc - -the center of the pixel
      Returns:
      the pixel color

    • listOfColors

      private java.util.List<Color> listOfColors​(java.util.List<Ray> rays)
      funk to find list of the 4 ray colors in the corners of the pixel
      Parameters:
      rays - -list of rays from the corners of the pixel
      Returns:
      list of colors

    • renderImageThreaded

      private void renderImageThreaded()
      This function renders image's pixel color map from the scene included with the Renderer object - with multi-threading

      This function renders image's pixel color map from the scene included with the Renderer object

    • printGrid

      public void printGrid​(int step, Color color)
      Create a grid [over the picture] in the pixel color map. given the grid's step and color.
      Parameters:
      step - grid's step
      color - grid's color
